<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_1112736_vroomvro_buchung</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_1112736_vroomvro_buchung">buchungstageISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="buchungstage" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>gesamtpreis_berechnen</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	// Add your code here
	var gr = new GlideRecord('x_1112736_vroomvro_buchung');
	
	var anz_tage = current.buchungstage;
	var kaution = current.car_id.kaution;
	var preisprotag = current.car_id.preis_pro_tag;
	
	var erg = preisprotag * anz_tage + kaution;
	
	current.final_costs.setDisplayValue(erg);
	current.final_costs.setValue(erg);
	current.update();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>claudia</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-24 22:39:44</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2352fea6473cf5107ec50d45d36d43de</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>gesamtpreis_berechnen</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="VroomVroom" source="x_1112736_vroomvro">7ee51c1a4730b5107ec50d45d36d4385</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="VroomVroom">7ee51c1a4730b5107ec50d45d36d4385</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_2352fea6473cf5107ec50d45d36d43de</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>claudia</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-25 07:55:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=2352fea6473cf5107ec50d45d36d43de"/></record_update>
